title: The Final KFGD From Home - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.10.22
description:
Greg and Tim close out the work from home era of KFGD with one last hurrah! Let's talk about the last 2.5 years, what is Phil Spencer hiding, and Square Enix Montreal changing their name to... Onoma?

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:59 - “What are you looking forward to most with the launch of the new studio?” - Tyler Kabbes
00:10:52 - Housekeeping
It’s FINALLY happening: THIS FRIDAY we’re moving into the Spare Bedroom
The Roper Report   -
00:14:47 - What is Phil Spencer hiding?!
00:23:59 - Square Enix Montreal rebrands as Onoma
00:33:13 - Microsoft generated $2.9bn from Xbox Game Pass last year
00:41:28 - The Spare Bedroom “Ad”
00:42:44 - Modern Warfare 2 will seemingly require a phone number like Overwatch 2
00:48:21 - Persona 3 and 4 ports have gotten a release date
00:54:33 - Out today
00:56:04 - “What’s one news story/ongoing issue that you hope never gets brought up again on KFGD?” - Kozibear
00:57:53 - Squad Up: probablyoliver - Overwatch 2 - Oliverprob#2750
00:58:39 - You‘re Wrong

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
